title: Requires certain final judgments, involving public funds disbursed for legislative initiatives, to require payments of three-fold the amount of property
summary: Requires certain final judgments, involving public funds disbursed for legislative initiatives, to require payments of three-fold the amount or value of the state-owned or held property at issue.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state finance law, in relation to amount of judgment in an action by the people for illegal receipt or disposition of public funds or other property
